query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 La sete natural che mai non sazia 2 se non con l’acqua onde la femminetta 3 samaritana domandò la grazia,
4 mi travagliava, e pungeami la fretta 5 per la ’mpacciata via dietro al mio duca, 6 e condoleami a la giusta vendetta.
query.result:
**English:**
1 The natural thirst that is never quenched 2 except by the water for which the little woman 3 of Samaria asked for grace,
4 tormented me, and the haste pricked me 5 along the obstructed way behind my guide, 6 and I grieved for the just vengeance.
**Malay:**
1 Dahaga alami yang tidak pernah terpuaskan 2 kecuali dengan air yang diminta oleh wanita kecil 3 Samaria memohon belas kasihan,
4 menyiksaku aku, dan desakan itu menusukku 5 melalui jalan yang terhalang di belakang pemanduku, 6 dan aku berduka cita atas pembalasan yang adil.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Ed ecco, sì come ne scrive Luca 8 che Cristo apparve a’ due ch’erano in via, 9 già surto fuor de la sepulcral buca,
10 ci apparve un’ombra, e dietro a noi venìa, 11 dal piè guardando la turba che giace; 12 né ci addemmo di lei, sì parlò pria,
13 dicendo: «O frati miei, Dio vi dea pace».
query.result:
**English:**
7 And behold, just as Luke writes 8 that Christ appeared to the two who were on the way, 9 already risen from the sepulchral cave,
10 a shade appeared to us, and came behind us, 11 looking down at the crowd that lay at our feet; 12 nor did we notice it, until it spoke first,
13 saying: "O my brothers, may God give you peace."
**Malay:**
7 Dan lihatlah, sebagaimana yang ditulis oleh Lukas 8 bahwa Kristus menampakkan diri kepada dua orang yang sedang dalam perjalanan, 9 setelah bangkit dari liang kubur,
10 sesosok bayangan muncul kepada kami, dan mengikuti kami, 11 melihat ke bawah pada kerumunan yang terbaring di kaki kami; 12 dan kami tidak memperhatikannya, sampai ia berbicara terlebih dahulu,
13 berkata: "Hai saudara-saudaraku, semoga Tuhan memberikan kedamaian kepada kalian."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
14 Noi ci volgemmo sùbiti, e Virgilio 15 rendéli ’l cenno ch’a ciò si conface.
16 Poi cominciò: «Nel beato concilio 17 ti ponga in pace la verace corte 18 che me rilega ne l’etterno essilio».
query.result:
**English:**
14 We turned suddenly, and Virgil 15 gave the signal that was appropriate for this.
16 Then he began: "May the true court 17 place you in peace in the blessed council 18 that relegates me to eternal exile".
**Malay:**
14 Kami berpaling tiba-tiba, dan Virgil 15 memberikan isyarat yang sesuai untuk ini.
16 Kemudian dia mulai: "Semoga pengadilan yang benar 17 menempatkanmu dalam kedamaian di dewan yang diberkati 18 yang membuangku ke pengasingan abadi".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 «Come!», diss’ elli, e parte andavam forte: 20 «se voi siete ombre che Dio sù non degni, 21 chi v’ha per la sua scala tanto scorte?».
query.result:
**English:**
19 "Come!" he said, and we set off walking quickly: 20 "If you are shades that God does not deem worthy of heaven, 21 who has escorted you so far up his ladder?".
**Malay:**
19 "Mari!", katanya, dan kami berjalan cepat: 20 "Jika kamu adalah bayangan yang tidak layak di mata Tuhan, 21 siapa yang telah mengantarmu sejauh ini menaiki tangga-Nya?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 E ’l dottor mio: «Se tu riguardi a’ segni 23 che questi porta e che l’angel profila, 24 ben vedrai che coi buon convien ch’e’ regni.
query.result:
**English:**
22 And my teacher: "If you look at the signs 23 that this one bears and that the angel outlines, 24 you will see clearly that he must reign with the good."
**Malay:**
22 Dan guruku: "Jika kamu memperhatikan tanda-tanda 23 yang dibawa oleh orang ini dan yang digariskan oleh malaikat, 24 kamu akan melihat dengan jelas bahwa ia harus memerintah bersama orang-orang baik."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Ma perché lei che dì e notte fila 26 non li avea tratta ancora la conocchia 27 che Cloto impone a ciascuno e compila,
28 l’anima sua, ch’è tua e mia serocchia, 29 venendo sù, non potea venir sola, 30 però ch’al nostro modo non adocchia.
query.result:
**English:**
25 But why she who spins day and night 26 had not yet drawn them from the distaff 27 that Clotho allots and prepares for each person,
28 her soul, which is your sister and mine, 29 coming up, could not come alone, 30 because it does not see in our way.
**Malay:**
25 Tetapi mengapa dia yang memintal siang dan malam 26 belum menariknya dari serokan 27 yang Cloto tetapkan dan susun untuk setiap orang,
28 jiwanya, yang merupakan saudara perempuanmu dan saudara perempuanku, 29 datang, tidak bisa datang sendirian, 30 karena ia tidak melihat dengan cara kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Ond’ io fui tratto fuor de l’ampia gola 32 d’inferno per mostrarli, e mosterrolli 33 oltre, quanto ’l potrà menar mia scola.
query.result:
**English:**
31 From there I was drawn out of the wide mouth 32 of hell to show it to him, and I will show him 33 beyond, as far as my teaching can lead him.
**Malay:**
31 Dari sana aku ditarik keluar dari mulut yang lebar 32 neraka untuk menunjukkannya kepadanya, dan aku akan menunjukkan kepadanya 33 lebih jauh, sejauh mana pengajaranku dapat membawanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Ma dimmi, se tu sai, perché tai crolli 35 diè dianzi ’l monte, e perché tutto ad una 36 parve gridare infino a’ suoi piè molli».
query.result:
**English:**
34 But tell me, if you know, why those landslides 35 happened just now on the mountain, and why everything 36 seemed to cry out down to its soft foot».
**Malay:**
34 Tetapi katakan padaku, jika kamu tahu, mengapa tanah longsor itu 35 terjadi tadi di gunung, dan mengapa semuanya 36 tampak berteriak hingga ke kakinya yang lembut».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Sì mi diè, dimandando, per la cruna 38 del mio disio, che pur con la speranza 39 si fece la mia sete men digiuna.
query.result:
**English:**
37 Yes, he said to me, asking for the needle's eye 38 of my desire, which with hope alone 39 made my thirst less thirsty.
**Malay:**
37 Ya, katanya kepadaku, meminta lubang jarum 38 dari keinginanku, yang hanya dengan harapan 39 membuat dahagaku menjadi kurang dahaga.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Quei cominciò: «Cosa non è che sanza 41 ordine senta la religïone 42 de la montagna, o che sia fuor d’usanza.
query.result:
**English:**
40 He began: "What is it that without 41 order feels the religion 42 of the mountain, or that is out of custom?
**Malay:**
40 Dia memulai: "Apakah yang tanpa 41 aturan merasakan agama 42 gunung, atau yang keluar dari kebiasaan?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Libero è qui da ogne alterazione: 44 di quel che ’l ciel da sé in sé riceve 45 esser ci puote, e non d’altro, cagione.
query.result:
**English:**
43 Here one is free from all alteration: 44 of that which heaven receives into itself from itself 45 there can be a cause, and of nothing else.
**Malay:**
43 Di sini seseorang bebas dari segala perubahan: 44 dari apa yang diterima langit dari dirinya sendiri 45 dapat menjadi penyebab, dan bukan dari yang lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Trema forse più giù poco o assai; 56 ma per vento che ’n terra si nasconda, 57 non so come, qua sù non tremò mai.
query.result:
**English:**
55 Perhaps it trembles a little or a lot down below; 56 but because of a wind that hides itself in the earth, 57 I don’t know how, up here it never trembled.
**Malay:**
55 Mungkin sedikit atau banyak gemetar di bawah sana; 56 tetapi karena angin yang bersembunyi di dalam bumi, 57 entah bagaimana, di sini tidak pernah gemetar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Tremaci quando alcuna anima monda 59 sentesi, sì che surga o che si mova 60 per salir sù; e tal grido seconda.
query.result:
**English:**
58 Trembles when a pure soul 59 is sentenced, so that heaven or that it moves 60 to rise up; and such a cry follows.
**Malay:**
58 Gemetar ketika suatu jiwa yang murni 59 dijatuhi hukuman, sehingga surga atau bahwa ia bergerak 60 untuk bangkit; dan tangisan seperti itu mengikuti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 De la mondizia sol voler fa prova, 62 che, tutto libero a mutar convento, 63 l’alma sorprende, e di voler le giova.
query.result:
**English:**
61 It only wants to try the garbage, 62 which, completely free to change convents, 63 surprises the soul, and it enjoys wanting it.
**Malay:**
61 Ia hanya ingin mencoba sampah, 62 yang, sepenuhnya bebas untuk mengubah biara, 63 mengejutkan jiwa, dan ia senang menginginkannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Prima vuol ben, ma non lascia il talento 65 che divina giustizia, contra voglia, 66 come fu al peccar, pone al tormento.
query.result:
**English:**
64 At first it wills the good, but does not allow the talent 65 that divine justice, against its will, 66 as it was in sinning, places in torment.
**Malay:**
64 Pada awalnya ia menginginkan kebaikan, tetapi tidak membiarkan bakat 65 yang keadilan ilahi, bertentangan dengan keinginannya, 66 seperti saat berbuat dosa, menempatkan dalam siksaan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 E io, che son giaciuto a questa doglia 68 cinquecent’ anni e più, pur mo sentii 69 libera volontà di miglior soglia:
70 però sentisti il tremoto e li pii 71 spiriti per lo monte render lode 72 a quel Segnor, che tosto sù li ’nvii».
query.result:
**English:**
67 And I, who have lain in this pain 68 for five hundred years and more, only just now felt 69 the free will to reach a better threshold:
70 therefore you felt the earthquake and the pious 71 spirits throughout the mountain rendering praise 72 to that Lord who soon will send us up.”
**Malay:**
67 Dan aku, yang telah terbaring dalam kesakitan ini 68 selama lima ratus tahun dan lebih, baru saja merasakan 69 kebebasan untuk mencapai ambang yang lebih baik:
70 oleh karena itu kamu merasakan gempa bumi dan roh-roh saleh 71 di seluruh gunung memuji 72 Tuhan yang akan segera mengirim kita ke atas.”

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Così ne disse; e però ch’el si gode 74 tanto del ber quant’ è grande la sete, 75 non saprei dir quant’ el mi fece prode.
query.result:
**English:**
73 Thus he spoke; and because he enjoys 74 the good as much as the thirst is great, 75 I cannot say how much he benefited me.
**Malay:**
73 Demikian katanya; dan karena dia menikmati 74 kebaikan sebanyak dahaga itu besar, 75 aku tidak tahu harus berkata berapa banyak dia membantuku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 E ’l savio duca: «Omai veggio la rete 77 che qui vi ’mpiglia e come si scalappia, 78 perché ci trema e di che congaudete.
query.result:
**English:**
76 And the wise leader: "Now I see the net 77 that ensnares you here and how one escapes it, 78 why it trembles and what you rejoice at.
**Malay:**
76 Dan pemimpin yang bijaksana: "Sekarang kulihat jaring 77 yang menjerat kalian di sini dan bagaimana cara melepaskannya, 78 mengapa ia gemetar dan apa yang kalian bergembira karenanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Ora chi fosti, piacciati ch’io sappia, 80 e perché tanti secoli giaciuto 81 qui se’, ne le parole tue mi cappia».
query.result:
**English:**
79 Now who were you, may it please you that I know, 80 and why have you lain here for so many centuries, 81 tell me in your words.
**Malay:**
79 Sekarang siapakah kamu, sudilah kiranya agar aku tahu, 80 dan mengapa kamu telah terbaring di sini selama berabad-abad, 81 katakanlah kepadaku dalam kata-katamu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 «Nel tempo che ’l buon Tito, con l’aiuto 83 del sommo rege, vendicò le fóra 84 ond’ uscì ’l sangue per Giuda venduto,
85 col nome che più dura e più onora 86 era io di là», rispuose quello spirto, 87 «famoso assai, ma non con fede ancora.
query.result:
**English:**
82 "In the time when the good Titus, with the help 83 of the supreme king, avenged the wounds 84 from which the blood of Judas the betrayed flowed,
85 with the name that endures and honors most 86 I was there," replied that spirit, 87 "quite famous, but not yet with faith.
**Malay:**
82 "Pada masa ketika Titus yang baik, dengan bantuan 83 raja tertinggi, membalas dendam atas luka-luka 84 yang darinya darah Yudas yang dikhianati mengalir,
85 dengan nama yang paling abadi dan paling terhormat 86 aku ada di sana," jawab roh itu, 87 "cukup terkenal, tetapi belum beriman.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Tanto fu dolce mio vocale spirto, 89 che, tolosano, a sé mi trasse Roma, 90 dove mertai le tempie ornar di mirto.
query.result:
**English:**
88 So sweet was my poetic spirit, 89 that, a Tolosan, Rome drew me to herself, 90 where she deemed me worthy to crown my temples with myrtle.
**Malay:**
88 Begitu manisnya semangat vokalku, 89 sehingga, sebagai orang Tolosan, Roma menarikku kepadanya, 90 di mana dia menganggapku layak untuk memahkotai pelipisku dengan murad.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Stazio la gente ancor di là mi noma: 92 cantai di Tebe, e poi del grande Achille; 93 ma caddi in via con la seconda soma.
query.result:
**English:**
91 The people still call me Statius over there: 92 I sang of Thebes, and then of the great Achilles; 93 but I fell by the wayside with the second burden.
**Malay:**
91 Orang-orang masih memanggilku Statius di sana: 92 bernyanyi tentang Thebes, dan kemudian tentang Achilles yang agung; 93 tetapi aku jatuh di tengah jalan dengan beban kedua.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 E per esser vivuto di là quando 101 visse Virgilio, assentirei un sole 102 più che non deggio al mio uscir di bando».
query.result:
**English:**
100 And to have lived there when 101 Virgil lived, I would consent to one sun 102 more than I am due to serve for my release from exile."
**Malay:**
100 Dan untuk hidup di sana ketika 101 Virgil hidup, aku akan menyetujui satu matahari 102 lebih dari yang seharusnya kulakukan untuk keluar dari pengasinganku."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Or son io d’una parte e d’altra preso: 116 l’una mi fa tacer, l’altra scongiura 117 ch’io dica; ond’ io sospiro, e sono inteso
118 dal mio maestro, e «Non aver paura», 119 mi dice, «di parlar; ma parla e digli 120 quel ch’e’ dimanda con cotanta cura».
query.result:
**English:**
115 Now I am seized on one side and the other: 116 one makes me keep silent, the other implores 117 that I should speak; wherefore I sigh, and am heard
118 by my master, and he says to me, "Do not be afraid 119 to speak; but speak and tell him 120 what he asks with such great care."
**Malay:**
115 Sekarang aku ditangkap di satu sisi dan sisi lainnya: 116 yang satu membuatku diam, yang lain memohon 117 agar aku bicara; oleh karena itu aku mendesah, dan didengar
118 oleh guruku, dan dia berkata kepadaku, "Jangan takut 119 untuk berbicara; tetapi bicaralah dan katakan padanya 120 apa yang dia minta dengan perhatian yang begitu besar."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Ond’ io: «Forse che tu ti maravigli, 122 antico spirto, del rider ch’io fei; 123 ma più d’ammirazion vo’ che ti pigli.
query.result:
**English:**
121 Then I said: "Perhaps you marvel, 122 ancient spirit, at the laughter I made; 123 but I want you to be even more amazed.
**Malay:**
121 Lalu aku berkata: "Mungkin kamu heran, 122 roh kuno, dengan tawa yang kubuat; 123 tetapi aku ingin kamu lebih kagum lagi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Questi che guida in alto li occhi miei, 125 è quel Virgilio dal qual tu togliesti 126 forte a cantar de li uomini e d’i dèi.
query.result:
**English:**
124 This one who guides my eyes on high, 125 is that Virgil from whom you took 126 the power to sing of men and of gods.
**Malay:**
124 Orang ini yang menuntun mataku ke atas, 125 adalah Virgil yang darinya kamu mengambil 126 kekuatan untuk bernyanyi tentang manusia dan para dewa.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Se cagion altra al mio rider credesti, 128 lasciala per non vera, ed esser credi 129 quelle parole che di lui dicesti».
query.result:
**English:**
127 If you believed some other cause for my laughter, 128 abandon it as untrue, and believe 129 those words that you spoke about him.
**Malay:**
127 Jika kamu percaya sebab lain untuk tawaku, 128 tinggalkanlah itu sebagai tidak benar, dan percayalah 129 kata-kata yang kamu ucapkan tentangnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Già s’inchinava ad abbracciar li piedi 131 al mio dottor, ma el li disse: «Frate, 132 non far, ché tu se’ ombra e ombra vedi».
query.result:
**English:**
130 He was already bowing down to embrace the feet 131 of my guide, but he said to him: "Brother, 132 do not do that, for you are a shade and you see a shade."
**Malay:**
130 Dia sudah membungkuk untuk memeluk kaki 131 pemanduku, tetapi dia berkata kepadanya: "Saudaraku, 132 jangan lakukan itu, karena kamu adalah bayangan dan kamu melihat bayangan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Ed ei surgendo: «Or puoi la quantitate 134 comprender de l’amor ch’a te mi scalda, 135 quand’ io dismento nostra vanitate,
136 trattando l’ombre come cosa salda».
query.result:
**English:**
133 And he, rising: "Now you can understand the amount 134 of love that warms me towards you, 135 when I forget our vanity,
136 treating the shades as solid things".
**Malay:**
133 Dan dia bangkit: "Sekarang kamu dapat memahami jumlah 134 cinta yang menghangatkanku terhadapmu, 135 ketika aku melupakan kesombongan kita,
136 memperlakukan bayangan sebagai benda padat".
